name: Mini Man (Demo Test)
description:
A 2D platformer I wanna make as a beginner dev with GDevelop. I need your opinion on how I can improve the game so I can make it better. I'll appreciate it.

BTW. Don't try to check the controls in-game. That may open a lot of pages on your browser and may crash it. I'm working on this issue and thanks for visiting this page!
